jsymbolic2.processing

Class FileValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsymbolic2.processing.FileValidator

  • public class FileValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Checks if File input is valid with respect to files in MusicFileFilter.java. If so, it returns the correct sequence, otherwise it logs the error in in the List(String) errorLog and throws the exception back.

      • correctFileExtension

        public static java.lang.String correctFileExtension(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                    java.lang.String fileExtension)
        Checks if the fileName contains .fileExtensions at the end of the fileName. Then returns appropriate fileName with extension.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file name to be checked.
        fileExtension - file extension to be checked.
        Returns:
        if fileName not valid then return fileName.fileExtension otherwise return the fileName as is.

      • filePathExists

        public static boolean filePathExists(java.lang.String fileName)
        Given a file name or path, this will return whether the actual path to this file exists.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file name that needs to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the path to this file exists or if the fileName is path that does exist, otherwise returns false

      • getValidMeiSequence

        public static org.ddmal.jmei2midi.MeiSequence getValidMeiSequence(java.io.File file,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorLog)
                                                           throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                                                                  java.io.IOException,
                                                                  ca.mcgill.music.ddmal.mei.MeiXmlReader.MeiXmlReadException
        Parameters:
        file - A file to be parsed from.
        errorLog - Error log to write out all errors to.
        Returns:
        An mei sequence if the file was in fact a valid mei file.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - Thrown if the MIDI data is invalid.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a problem reading from the inputted file.
        ca.mcgill.music.ddmal.mei.MeiXmlReader.MeiXmlReadException - Thrown if there is a problem reading in the MEI XML from the inputted file.

      • getValidSequence

        public static javax.sound.midi.Sequence getValidSequence(java.io.File file,
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorLog)
                                                  throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                                                         java.io.IOException,
                                                         ca.mcgill.music.ddmal.mei.MeiXmlReader.MeiXmlReadException
        Gets a valid Java Sequence object from the given file. If file is not valid, then it throws an exception.
        Parameters:
        file - file to be validated
        errorLog - errors that occur during validation
        Returns:
        sequence object created from either MIDI or MEI
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - Thrown if the MIDI data is invalid.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a problem reading from the inputted file.
        ca.mcgill.music.ddmal.mei.MeiXmlReader.MeiXmlReadException - Thrown if there is a problem reading in the MEI XML from the inputted file.

        Validates an mei file by actually processing it and seeing if it is valid mei
        Parameters:

        Returns:
